name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Memberful members
description: Every time a new member signs up into your Memberful, Make will automatically add a row in your Google Sheets. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ZETg_GMylO6ObNU6qsQnkdP8mtnQF06py4aiSS2oxZA/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
